title: Bug 116564 - Title of Hyperlink Builder changes with settings
description: The title of the Hyperlink Builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', but it changes with the settings.
OB: When clicking on 'OK' and then reopening the Hyperlink Builder, the title becomes 'www.actuate.com'.
EB: The title of the Hyperlink Builder should always be 'Hyperlink Options'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Set a label hyperlink as 'www.actuate.com'.
2. Click on 'OK' and then reopen the Hyperlink Builder.
